Reviews.Title: Its good, but no handset came with delivery...
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: It was great, shipped from cali to ohio in 4 days, but there was no handset included, just phone and charger, which is okay for me but I kinda wanted to listen to music. But the reason why I gave it 5 stars is because its updated to windows 6.5, instead of 6.1 which saves the hastle of manually updating it yourself.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as described
Reviews.Author: HeatherNicole
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived in a timely manner and was packaged well.  The phone was exactly as described and works wonderfully.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: damian
Reviews.Content: Este célular es súper elegante, sus funciones son increíble y sobre todo su precio.lo Recomiendo, me sentí súper felíz cuando obtuve este producto en amazon.com

ProductInfo.Features:
This slab-style messaging smartphone is similar to the Snap S511, but adds global roaming, WiFi, and visual voicemail.
Other features are similar, like Windows Mobile,QWERTY keyboard,GPS navigation,MMS,memory card slot,2-megapixel camera with video capture,etc
ProductInfo.Name: Verizon HTC Ozone VX 6175
